quests.name: A Knife in the Dark
quests.description: You must prove your worthiness to join the Brotherhood.

quests.name: A Watery Grave
quests.description: You must kill the captain of the pirate vessel Marie Elena.

quests.name: Accidents Happen
quests.description: An honest Wood Elf in Bruma has upset some dishonest people.

quests.name: Scheduled for Execution
quests.description: An old "friend" in the Imperial Prison needs to be released... from living.

quests.name: The Renegade Shadowscale
quests.description: Eradicate a fugitive Shadowscale named Scar-Tail and bring back his heart as proof for Teinaava.

quests.name: The Assassinated Man
quests.description: Help Francois Motierre fake his death to escape his cowardly mistakes.

quests.name: Darkness Eternal
quests.description: Accept Vicente Valtieri's offer to become a vampire.

quests.name: The Lonely Wanderer
quests.description: A High Elf in the Imperial City must be removed from existence.

quests.name: Bad Medicine
quests.description: Cure the sickly warlord Roderick at Fort Sutch: a spoonful of sugar, a pint of poison.

quests.name: Whodunit?
quests.description: Summitmist Manor; there were six on the night of last and then there were none... save one.

quests.name: Permanent Retirement
quests.description: Adamus Phillida spent years looking for the Brotherhood; assure him they've always been "right behind him."

quests.name: The Purification
quests.description: Things at the Sanctuary have gone sour, and the Brotherhood can't afford chance or weakness.

quests.name: Affairs of a Wizard
quests.description: The first Dead Drop contract at Hero Hill, to stop a necromancer from achieving immortality.

quests.name: Next of Kin
quests.description: Next to the Great Oak in Chorrol, your next assignment demands the lives of an entire bloodline.

quests.name: Broken Vows
quests.description: Deep within the well of Skingrad Castle Courtyard, the next drop matches killer against killer.

quests.name: Final Justice
quests.description: Beneath an Old Bridge lies the next drop, requesting judgment on a known psychotic.

quests.name: A Matter of Honor
quests.description: Alval Uvani, a traveling Dunmer merchant skilled in Destruction, makes a perfect target for a forest ambush.

quests.name: The Coldest Sleep
quests.description: Locate a Nord at Gnoll Mountain, said to be running from a fate he chose in Solstheim. Today it will find him.

quests.name: A Kiss Before Dying
quests.description: In Bravil lies the home of the Lucky Old Lady and a "lucky" Bosmer, and today fortune shines on both... but only one shines back.

quests.name: Following a Lead
quests.description: What have you been doing, puppet?

quests.name: Honor Thy Mother
quests.description: Root out the traitor and end his trail of carnage.

quests.name: Whispers of Death
quests.description: Relay the prayers of the vengeful to ensure their vengeance is fulfilled.
